name: Chocolate Banana Muffins
description: A delicious way to get kids to eat their fruit-with just enough chocolate, it feels like a treat!

ingredients.name: low-fat plain yogurt or low-fat sour cream

preparation: Mash bananas with a fork, measuring about 1 1⁄2 cups.
Using an electric mixer, beat bananas with sugar, oil, egg and vanilla extract in a large bowl until well mixed.
Whisk flour with baking powder, baking soda and Cinnamon in a large bowl. Pour banana mixture overtop. Using a spoon, gently stir together, then stir in yogurt and chocolate chips.
Spoon batter into a lightly oiled muffin pan and bake in centre of oven for 15-18 minutes until a cake tester inserted in centre of muffin comes out clean. Let stand 2 minutes, then turn out of pan.
tips: Make ahead and freeze for an easy breakfast or snack and serve with a refreshing glass of cold milk.
